name: Ext_R5_ResearchStudy_site
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ResearchStudy.site for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ResearchStudy.site from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Facility where study activities are conducted
element.definition: A facility in which study activities are conducted.
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.site` maps to R4B `ResearchStudy.site`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Facility where study activities are conducted
element.definition: A facility in which study activities are conducted.
element.comment: `ResearchStudy.site` maps to R4B `ResearchStudy.site`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchStudy)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
